description: Health Checks & Diagnostics Dashboard - Self-diagnosis tools for deployment troubleshooting

tasks.title: Create Backend Health Service & Basic Endpoint
tasks.description: As a system admin, I want an API endpoint that reports database connection status and environment configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: Create GET /api/health endpoint returning JSON status
Endpoint should be public (no auth required)

tasks.title: Add Migration Status Check
tasks.description: As a system admin, I want to know if my database schema is up to date.
acceptanceCriteria: Query _prisma_migrations table or use Prisma SDK to find pending migrations

tasks.title: Create Diagnostics Dashboard UI
tasks.description: As a user, I want a visual page to see the system health status.
acceptanceCriteria: Display status cards for Database, Environment, and Migrations
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

tasks.title: Add Client-Side Checks and Troubleshooting Advice
tasks.description: As a user, I want to know if my browser supports required features and how to fix server issues.
acceptanceCriteria: Check for Web Crypto API support in the browser
Display browser compatibility on Diagnostics page
Show specific command-line advice if backend checks fail (e.g., 'Run bd migrate')
Add link to /diagnostics from Login page if server is unreachable
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
